nodes.name: 1. Search LinkedIn for Hiring Companies
nodes.notes: Uses Proxycurl API to find companies

nodes.name: 3. Find Founder Email (Snov.io)
nodes.notes: Snov.io finds all emails from company domain

nodes.name: 4. Filter Founder Email
nodes.notes: Extracts founder/CEO email from Snov.io results

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "contents": [{
    "parts": [{
      "text": "You are a world-class sales researcher. Analyze this company for highly personalized cold outreach.

COMPANY DATA:
- Company: {{ $json.company_name }}
- Founder: {{ $json.founder_name }} ({{ $json.founder_position }})
- Hiring for: {{ $json.hiring_role }}
- Job Description: {{ $json.job_description }}
- Website: {{ $json.company_website }}

YOUR MISSION:
Spend 2 hours researching this company (simulate this). Identify:

1. **PAIN POINTS** (3-5 specific ones):
   - What's keeping them up at night?
   - What's blocking their growth?
   - Where are they wasting money/time?

2. **AUTOMATION OPPORTUNITIES** (2-3 specific):
   - What manual processes are killing productivity?
   - What can be automated immediately?

3. **PERFORMANCE GAPS**:
   - Where is their product/website underperforming?
   - What are competitors doing better?

4. **COST-CUTTING POTENTIAL**:
   - Where are they overspending on development?
   - How much can an MVP approach save them?

5. **SCALABILITY ISSUES**:
   - What will break when they scale?
   - What technical debt are they building?

READY LAUNCH SOLUTION:
- We build scalable MVPs in 4-6 WEEKS (not 6 months)
- 10X cost reduction: Save $40,000-$150,000 vs premium agencies
- Built Sora AI video tool: Users upload photos, interact with Krishna from Mahabharata
- Services: Full-stack apps, automation, AI integration, landing pages + SEO
- Focus: Launch fast, iterate quickly

OUTPUT (JSON ONLY - NO MARKDOWN):
{
  "pain_points": ["specific pain 1", "pain 2", "pain 3"],
  "automation_opportunities": ["automation 1", "automation 2"],
  "performance_gaps": ["gap 1", "gap 2"],
  "cost_cutting_potential": "how much they can save with specific numbers",
  "scalability_concerns": ["concern 1", "concern 2"],
  "our_solution_fit": "exact Ready Launch solution for their problems",
  "personalized_hook": "compelling opening line mentioning specific pain"
}

Be ULTRA SPECIFIC. Use details from job description. Make it feel like hours of research."
    }]
  }]
}

={ "contents": [{ "parts": [{ "text": "Write an ultra-personalized cold email for Ready Launch. RECIPIENT: - Name: {{ $json.founder_name }} - Company: {{ $json.company_name }} - Position: {{ $json.founder_position }} DEEP RESEARCH INSIGHTS: {{ JSON.stringify($json.ai_insights, null, 2) }} READY LAUNCH VALUE: - Build MVPs in 4-6 WEEKS (not 6 months) - Save $40,000-$150,000 vs premium agencies (be specific with their numbers) - Launch 3-6 months FASTER - Recent work: Sora AI video tool - users upload photos, interact with Krishna from Mahabharata - Services: Full-stack, automation, AI integration, landing pages + SEO EMAIL REQUIREMENTS: 1. Start with personalized hook from insights 2. Mention 2-3 SPECIFIC things about their company/situation 3. Identify their exact pain point 4. Present Ready Launch as THE solution 5. Include specific cost savings: "Save $XX,XXX-$XXX,XXX" 6. Mention time savings: "Launch 3-6 months faster" 7. Reference Sora AI product as social proof 8. One specific automation/improvement we can do 9. Clear CTA: "15-minute chat this week?" 10. Under 180 words 11. Conversational, human tone (not corporate/salesy) 12. Make it feel like we spent 2 hours researching them FORMAT: - Use HTML:
for breaks, for emphasis - Natural paragraphs, not bullet points - End with: Best regards,
[Your Name]
Ready Launch Write ONLY the email body. NO subject line. NO extra text." }] }] }

nodes.name: 9. Send Email to Found Address
nodes.notes: Sends to email found by Snov.io

nodes.name: 10. Save to CRM (Google Sheets)
nodes.notes: Tracks all outreach in Google Sheets

message.subject: =Re: {{ $json.subject }}
message.body:
=Hi,

Fantastic! I'm excited to discuss how Ready Launch can help.

Please book a time that works for you:
ðŸ“… Schedule 15-min call

I'll send a quick prep questionnaire before our call so we can maximize our time together.

Looking forward to it!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Ready Launch

P.S. Check out our work: [YOUR_PORTFOLIO_LINK]

message.subject: =Re: {{ $json.email_subject || 'Quick question about ' + $json.company_name }}
message.body:
=Hi {{ $json.founder_name }},

{{ $json.follow_up_number === 1 ? 'I wanted to share a quick case study:

We helped a startup save $45,000 in development costs and launch 3 months earlier than planned. Their revenue increased by 230% in the first quarter.

For ' + $json.company_name + ', we could deliver in half the time of traditional agencies.

Available for a quick call this week?' : '' }}{{ $json.follow_up_number === 2 ? 'I know you\'re busy building ' + $json.company_name + ', so I\'ll keep this brief.

Most startups overspend on development by 300-500%. Ready Launch specializes in lean, fast execution:

âœ“ Rapid MVP development
âœ“ Custom automation
âœ“ Full-stack applications

Would a 10-minute call make sense? Book here' : '' }}{{ $json.follow_up_number === 3 ? 'Reaching out one more time.

If timing isn\'t right, no worries. But if you\'re still looking to accelerate development, our clients typically see:

â€¢ 60-70% cost reduction
â€¢ 2-3x faster delivery

Calendar: Book here' : '' }}{{ $json.follow_up_number === 4 ? 'This will be my last email - don\'t want to clutter your inbox.

Thank you for your time. I genuinely wish you the best with ' + $json.company_name + '.

If things change, you know where to find us: Schedule call

Cheers to your success!' : '' }}

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Ready Launch
